comment: Really easy to pay my pals for anything we owe each other - makes the taxi rides home and group shopping a lot easier to deal with! And the free money goes without saying 😍😍
Good app to send money. Also a pain when send wrong amount and cancel as you still have to wait for it to leave your bank before recieveing it back

author: Angel Musaazi
comment: I love it . I just hate always explaining to people that they have to pay 25 to get the 5

author: Robin Mueller
comment: Use my code....n friend me we can make 10 bucks...FNJOBA

author: Andy burton
comment: FGRSQ my refferal add it in and get £10 :)
Best app ever u get money easily plus it's free
Wicked app

author: Adam Ward
comment: HPAULE ref code

author: Tianna Leighh
comment: Its an amazing alternative to send money!

author: Vanessa B.
comment: Quick and efficient way to send and receive money
Very easy, very functional

author: neil wilkinson
comment: Great app

author: Chris sprinkle
comment: Gotta jump through hoops to get your money even after requests for documents for identity are submitted. Customer service is terrible no communication.

author: Samantha Methe
comment: I love this app. Not only is sending money easy but you also get money for inviting friends/family to join. Use my promo code TGWELY to earn a free $5 😊 money is also instant when you cash out!

author: Two Footer
comment: It's lit 🙆🏿‍♀️ the verification process is a bit hectic at the start but once you get through it it's super handy to have

author: samuel powell
comment: Love it best app i have used!

author: Rezwan Basit
comment: Free money

author: Danchen Huang
comment: Best app ever
Love circle

author: David Gilligan
comment: Good

author: stephen melly
comment: The app was working as intended at first , an easy way to collect bills from my housemates and keep a record of it. Unfortunately every time I try to verify my account it doesn't work, the customer support line is inactive. I have called numerous times. The money in my account is needed and there is no way at this moment to withdraw. This app would  have 5 stars if not for this. Please can you get in contact with me, I have been sending you verification requests and calls for 2 weeks now.

author: takir hossain
comment: This app is fantastic!! Firstly I thought it was a joke or scam but it's actually true. In a week I earned £15 with just transfering and receiving moneys from my friends. That's awesome! I would recommend to everyone this app, who wants to make quick cash, especially teenagers who needs quick cash.

I have sent two requests to the help desk because my funds are locked. I needed this money on an emergency basis and I cannot withdraw this money. It asked me to verify my identity and I did that with a California I'D. And still nothing. I have yet to hear back from them. The funds are frozen. This app is a scam!

author: Jamie Stone
comment: Stop being so stubborn and just bring bitcoins back.  I personally don't use bitcoins but I would if this app continued support, and you wouldn't get so many hate tweets if you did so.  Your reviews would be turned around for the better, AND you'd be making more money with increased use.  So, what are you going to do?  Not bring bitcoins back.  Thought so.

author: King OAK
comment: Terrible app, wouldn't let me log in, I reset my password, "you are not authorised to perform this action", nonsense. How can I trust an app to have my details when you can't even access your accounts. If anyone reading this is considering getting Circle, stick with PayPal much more reliable, faster and won't screw you around

author: Constance Dukes
comment: Customer service does not exist. The phone number they have listed is just an automated message tellong you to send a message. The message center within the app is a joke. Each time you correspond via email you won't hear from an associate for 24+hrs. Each time you reply! My acct is still under review, even though I've verified my identity multiple times.

author: Joe Finucane
comment: Terrible app. I had money on my account which I need urgently. Before I could access to it I had to verify my identity, fair enough. But I followed the steps multiple times however buggy software and poor gramming prevented my attempts from working. Customer service were useless. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS USELESS EXCUSE FOR AN APP. If I could rate it any lower I would.

author: akiara09
comment: It's better than PayPal! Can transfer funds to and from bank account really easily! Only thing is that it's a little hard to find people if they're not in your contacts. Great app, though.

author: Tadas Stankevicius
comment: Transferred money to my friend and because of a system error they took out 25£ twice, and told me that the transaction was succesful when it wasnt. Worst app ever. DO NOT download.

author: Jaylyn Jones
comment: I cashed out 25 dollars to my debit card and it says the transactions were "successful" but I haven't seen the money in my bank account at all. Won't let me sync my card anymore and customer service isn't helping.

author: Alexander Lefkowitz
comment: I thought this was a much more convenient and cheaper way to send money then Western Union and a good alternative to Venmo, Square Cash, and PayPal. Unfortunately my dad tried to send me some money for bills and even though they advertise it as instant they informed us that it would take up to 5 days to review the transaction. Square takes a few hours, PayPal takes one day, Western Union takes maybe an hour.  So I see this app as playing catch-up with the other apps while holding up my money for much longer then needed. Very unhappy. This has caused me to be late with bills.

author: Ashly Guerrier
comment: I had an issue with them at first because of the length it took to review my account, but once I expressed my concerns and my frustrations they immediately resolved my issue and responded back to my emails with lightening speed. Let's not forget the cash deposit is INSTANT WITH NO FEES!!! Great app!! :)

This app is absolutely perfect I was skeptical at first but when I tried it they really give you free money it's amazing!!! Try promo code JFPAZY and then message me to get started. Update you will have to add your bank card to receive the free $5 dollars but they won't charge you and I will send you the money to get started!

author: Diamante Colon
comment: This app is extremely convention,  easy to use,  and works quickly. Plus it's FREE to transfer you money to you account and no wait!!!

author: Sarah Hull
comment: Brilliant app! I use this with the SNATCH app  for when I win money in the free golden parcels I snatch! Love both apps and they work perfectly together.  Having said that, Circle as a stand alone app for sending and receiving money from friends and family is just great with a few sneaky features that help make it fun too such as the ability to send a gif or a little thank you note.   Get it downloaded!

author: korey dady
comment: Tried contacting their support several times to recover my account and have got no replies...

author: Charlotte polley
comment: Great app! Earned £20 in a week for referring my friends! Easy to use. Easy to top up & withdraw :D

author: Melissa Crockwell
comment: Excellent app. Easiest was to send and receive money from friends. Like it much better than PayPal although it would be better if when u cash out the money from circle went instantly into your bank account usually need to wait an hour for it to clear but apart from that its great

author: yolo gameing
comment: Sent my partner money 10 days ago as im working away and she needed some cash for bills and household goods, she has still yet been able to cash out after several emails jist to be told the same thing that there is a back log and wil get sorted asap, if that was the case they ahouldnt accept transactions, wont be using again!

author: Tiffany Crosby
comment: Love this app! Its free and you can transfer money to people or your bank instantly for free!! I stopped using my paypal and started using this app.
